name: Bitcoin
creator: Satoshi Nakamoto

whitepaper.title: Bitcoin: A Peer-to-Peer Electronic Cash System

description: The first decentralized cryptocurrency, Bitcoin introduced blockchain technology and solved the double-spending problem in digital currencies.
problem_solved: Double-spending problem in digital currencies without requiring a trusted third party

milestones.details: Satoshi Nakamoto publishes the Bitcoin whitepaper on the cryptography mailing list
The first block of the Bitcoin blockchain is mined by Satoshi Nakamoto
Satoshi Nakamoto sends 10 BTC to Hal Finney in the first Bitcoin transaction
Laszlo Hanyecz pays 10,000 BTC for two pizzas, the first real-world Bitcoin transaction
